title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.14 - Hearings; continuation of
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 253.14 - Hearings; continuation of

State Regulations

The hearing officer may continue a hearing from day to
day or adjourn it to a later date or to a different place by announcement
thereof at the hearing or by other appropriate notice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
253.14

Renumbered from 253.39

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
